title: ADULT & NON FORMAL EDUCATION
utme_requirements:
a.      A Senior Secondary School Certificate (SSCE/WAEC/NECO/NABTEB or GCE ‘O’ Level with credit passes in five subjects (include English and Mathematics) in not more than two sittings.

b.      A Grade II Teachers’ Certificate (TC II) with credit or merit in five subjects, including Mathematics and English.
subjects: English Language and any other three (3) subjects from Social Science and Arts subjects.

title: AGRICULTURAL SCIENCE (DOUBLE MAJOR)
utme_requirements:
Five SSC credit passes in English Language and any three (3) of

 

1. Agricultural Science

2. Mathematics

3. Chemistry

4. Biology

5. Health Science

6. Integrated/Rural Science

7. Physics

8. Nature Study and

9. General Science.

 

NB

GROUP A:

1. Agricultural Science

2. Biology

3. Nutrition

4. Health Science.

5. Applied Biology

 

GROUP B:

1. Physics

2. Chemistry

3. Mathematics

4.Basic Mathematics/Arithmetic Process

5. Economics

6. Geography

7. Social Studies

8. Integrated Science

9. General Science
subjects: Agricultural Science, Chemistry, Biology/General Science or Mathematics.

title: BUSINESS EDUCATION
utme_requirements:
A minimum of five (5) credits in not more than two sittings including Mathematics and English.  In addition to this, all candidates must possess a credit in any two of the following subjects:

1.      Office Practice

2.      Introduction to Business Management

3.      Computer Studies

4.      Principles of

5.      Accounts/Bookkeeping

6.      Secretarial Duties

7.      Commerce

8.      Government

9.      Geography

10. Marketing

11. Economics
subjects: English Language, Mathematics and any two Social science subjects.

title: CHRISTIAN RELIGIOUS STUDIES/FRENCH
utme_requirements:
A Senior Secondary School Certificate (SSCE/WAEC/NECO/NABTEB or GCE ‘O’ Level/NBAIS or NABTEB) with five (5) credits including English Language and Mathematics at not more than two sittings. In addition to the general admission requirements, candidates wishing to read English as a single major must have Credit in literature in English at WASC/SSCE/GCE ‘O’ Level/NBAIS/NABTEB or NECO.

A Grade Two Teachers Certificate (TC II) with credit or merit in five subjects including Mathematics and English Language.
subjects: English Language, Literature in English and two arts subjects of candidate’s choice,

title: CHRISTIAN RELIGIOUS STUDIES/FRENCH
utme_requirements:
A Senior Secondary School Certificate (SSCE/WAEC/NECO/NABTEB or GCE ‘O’ Level/NBAIS or NABTEB) with five (5) credits including English Language and Mathematics at not more than two sittings. In addition to the general admission requirements, candidates wishing to read English as a single major must have Credit in literature in English at WASC/SSCE/GCE ‘O’ Level/NBAIS/NABTEB or NECO.

A Grade Two Teachers Certificate (TC II) with credit or merit in five subjects including Mathematics and English Language.
subjects: English Language, Literature in English and two arts subjects of candidate’s choice,

title: CHRISTIAN RELIGIOUS STUDIES/FRENCH
utme_requirements:
A Senior Secondary School Certificate (SSCE/WAEC/NECO/NABTEB or GCE ‘O’ Level/NBAIS or NABTEB) with five (5) credits including English Language and Mathematics at not more than two sittings. In addition to the general admission requirements, candidates wishing to read English as a single major must have Credit in literature in English at WASC/SSCE/GCE ‘O’ Level/NBAIS/NABTEB or NECO.

A Grade Two Teachers Certificate (TC II) with credit or merit in five subjects including Mathematics and English Language.
subjects: English Language, Literature in English and two arts subjects of candidate’s choice,

title: CHRISTIAN RELIGIOUS STUDIES/FRENCH
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Christian Religious Studies, French and one (1) other subject.
subjects: Christian Religious Studies, French and any other subject.

title: CHRISTIAN RELIGIOUS STUDIES/POLITICAL SCIENCE
utme_requirements:
A Senior Secondary School Certificate (SSSC) or G. C. E O’ Level with credits in any 5 subjects including English Language, Mathematics. Other requirements must include credit in Government, History or Civic Education, at not more than two sittings. Two of the credits must be relevant to course combination the candidate wishes to offer.

A Grade II Teacher’s Certificate (TC II) with credit or merit in five subjects, two of which must be relevant to the course the candidate wishes to offer. Credit/merit in English Language and Mathematics are part of the requirements.
subjects: English Language and any other three Arts subjects.

title: CHRISTIAN RELIGIOUS STUDIES/POLITICAL SCIENCE
utme_requirements:
A Senior Secondary School Certificate (SSSC) or G. C. E O’ Level with credits in any 5 subjects including English Language, Mathematics. Other requirements must include credit in Government, History or Civic Education, at not more than two sittings. Two of the credits must be relevant to course combination the candidate wishes to offer.

A Grade II Teacher’s Certificate (TC II) with credit or merit in five subjects, two of which must be relevant to the course the candidate wishes to offer. Credit/merit in English Language and Mathematics are part of the requirements.
subjects: English Language and any other three Arts subjects.

title: CHRISTIAN RELIGIOUS STUDIES/POLITICAL SCIENCE
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Government, Christian Religious Studies and any other Social Science subject.
subjects: Christian Religious Studies, Government and any other subject.

title: CHRISTIAN RELIGIOUS STUDIES/SOCIAL STUDIES
utme_requirements:
A Senior Secondary School Certificate (SSC) or G.C.E. O’ Level with credit in 5 subjects including English Language and Mathematics in not more than two sittings.

A Grade II Teachers’ Certificate (TC II) with credit or merit in five subjects, two which must be relevant to the course the candidate wishes to offer. Credit/merit in English Language and Mathematics are required.
subjects: English Language and any other three Arts subjects from Government, Economics, Geography, History, Commerce, Literature etc.

title: CHRISTIAN RELIGIOUS STUDIES/SOCIAL STUDIES
utme_requirements:
A Senior Secondary School Certificate (SSC) or G.C.E. O’ Level with credit in 5 subjects including English Language and Mathematics in not more than two sittings.

A Grade II Teachers’ Certificate (TC II) with credit or merit in five subjects, two which must be relevant to the course the candidate wishes to offer. Credit/merit in English Language and Mathematics are required.
subjects: English Language and any other three Arts subjects from Government, Economics, Geography, History, Commerce, Literature etc.

title: CHRISTIAN RELIGIOUS STUDIES/SOCIAL STUDIES
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Christian Religious Studies and any other two (2) of Economics/Commerce, Government/History, Government/Social Studies.
subjects: Christian Religious Studies and any other of History/Government, Geography, Social Studies, Economics/Commerce.

title: COMPUTER EDUCATION/BIOLOGY
utme_requirements:
a)     Senior secondary school certificate of WAEC or NECO or any other equivalent certificate from recognized examination bodies with credit in five subjects including English Languages and Mathematics at not more than two sittings. Two of the credits must be in the subjects relevant subjects making up the combinations the candidates wish to offer.

b)     A grade II Teacher’s Certificate (TC II) with credit or merit in five (5) subjects, two of which must be relevant to the course the candidate wishes to offer. Credits in English language and Mathematics are required for Candidates wishing to study Biology.
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Biology and any two others from Chemistry, Physics, Mathematics and science related subjects.

title: COMPUTER EDUCATION/BIOLOGY
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Biology/Integrated Science and any other Science subject.
subjects: Biology and any two (2) of Chemistry, Mathematics and Physics

title: COMPUTER EDUCATION/CHEMISTRY
utme_requirements:
a)     Senior Secondary School Certificate of WAEC or NECO or any other equivalent certificate from recognized examination bodies with credit in five subjects including English Languages and Mathematics at not more than two sittings. Two of the credits must be in chemistry and physics.

b)     A grade II Teacher’s Certificate (TC II) with credit or merit in five (5) subjects, two of which must be in general science and agricultural science. Credits/Merits in English language and Mathematics are required for Candidates wishing to study Chemistry.
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry and any other Science subject.

title: COMPUTER EDUCATION/CHEMISTRY
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Physics and any other Science subject.
subjects: Mathematics, Chemistry/Physics and any other Science subject

title: COMPUTER EDUCATION/MATHEMATICS
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics and any two (2) Science subjects.
subjects: Mathematics and any other two (2) Science subjects.

title: COMPUTER EDUCATION/PHYSICS
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics and any other two (2) Science subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and any other Science subject.

title: COMPUTER SCIENCE/ECONOMICS
utme_requirements: A Senior Secondary School Certificate (SSSC) or O’ Level with credit 5 subjects including English Language, Mathematics and Economics at not more than two sittings. The five subjects must include English, Mathematics and Physics/Computer Studies in not more than two sittings.
subjects: English Language and any other three Arts subjects.

title: COMPUTER SCIENCE/ECONOMICS
utme_requirements: A Senior Secondary School Certificate (SSSC) or O’ Level with credit 5 subjects including English Language, Mathematics and Economics at not more than two sittings. The five subjects must include English, Mathematics and Physics/Computer Studies in not more than two sittings.
subjects: English Language and any other three Arts subjects.

title: COMPUTER SCIENCE/ECONOMICS
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Economics, Physics and any other Science/Social Science subject.
subjects: Any three (3) of Economics, Mathematics/Physics and Chemistry.

General Admission Requirements are possession of a minimum of 5 credits at not more than two sittings including Mathematics and English Language in SSCE or its equivalent.

Possession of Grade II Teachers’ Certificate with credit or merit passes in 5 subjects including English Language and Mathematics.
subjects: English Language and any other three Arts subjects.

utme_requirements:
A Senior Secondary School Certificate (SSC) or G. C. E. O’ Level with credits in 5 subjects including Mathematics and English Language at not more than two sittings. A credit in Literature in English is required.

A Grade II Teachers’ Certificate (TC II) with credit or merit in five subjects, one of which must be Literature in English and Mathematics are the requirements.

Associateship Certificate in Education awarded by an approved institution in Nigeria or Abroad is also an acceptable qualification.
subjects: English Language and any other three Arts subjects.

title: EARLY CHILDHOOD CARE EDUCATION
utme_requirements:
·                    A Senior Secondary School Certificate (SSSC) or GCE O’ Level with credits in any 5 subjects including English Language, Mathematics, at not more than two sittings.

·                    A Grade II Teachers’ Certificate (TC II) with credit or merit in five subjects including English and Mathematics.

·                    Association Certificate in Education awarded by an approved Institution in Nigeria or Abroad, is also an acceptable qualification.
subjects: English Language, Mathematics and any two other subjects: Home Economics, Social Studies etc.

A Senior Secondary School Certificate (SSSC) or O’ Level with credit 5 subjects including English Language, Mathematics and Economics at not more than two sittings.

For holders of Grade II Teacher's Certificate. (TC II) pass or credit in 3 subjects, and 2 of the subjects must belong to the subjects the candidate wishes to study.

Then pass or credit in French language and or English language is compulsory.
subjects: English Language and any other three Arts subjects.

A Senior Secondary School Certificate (SSSC) or O’ Level with credit 5 subjects including English Language, Mathematics and Economics at not more than two sittings.

For holders of Grade II Teacher's Certificate. (TC II) pass or credit in 3 subjects, and 2 of the subjects must belong to the subjects the candidate wishes to study.

Then pass or credit in French language and or English language is compulsory.
subjects: English Language and any other three Arts subjects

title: FRENCH/GEOGRAPHY
utme_requirements:
A Senior Secondary School Certificate (SSC)/NECO or GCE ‘O’ Level with passes in five (5) subjects including English language and Mathematics in not more than two sittings.  Three of the credits must be in Geography. English and Mathematics.

A Grade II Teacher’s Certificate (TC II) with credit or merit passes in five subjects two of which must be relevant to the course the candidate wishes to offer. Credit/merit in English Language and Mathematics are additional requirements.

Note: Pass or credit in French language and or English language is compulsory for candidates wishing to read French as a single major.
subjects: English Language and any other three Arts subjects

title: FRENCH/SOCIAL STUDIES
utme_requirements:
A Senior Secondary School Certificate (SSC) or G.C.E. O’ Level with credit in 5 subjects including English Language and Mathematics in not more than two sittings.

A Grade II Teachers’ Certificate (TC II) with credit or merit in five subjects, two which must be relevant to the course the candidate wishes to offer. Credit/merit in English Language and Mathematics are required.
subjects: English Language and any other three Arts subjects from Government, Economics, Geography, History, Commerce, Literature etc.

title: FRENCH/SOCIAL STUDIES
utme_requirements:
A Senior Secondary School Certificate (SSC) or G.C.E. O’ Level with credit in 5 subjects including English Language and Mathematics in not more than two sittings.

A Grade II Teachers’ Certificate (TC II) with credit or merit in five subjects, two which must be relevant to the course the candidate wishes to offer. Credit/merit in English Language and Mathematics are required.
subjects: English Language and any other three Arts subjects from Government, Economics, Geography, History, Commerce, Literature etc.

utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passesin English Language, Mathematics, French and any two (2) of the following

1. Geography

2. Economics

3. Government

4. History
subjects: French and any two (2) of Geography, History, Economics and Government.

A Grade II Teacher’s Certificate (TC II) with credit or merit passes in five subjects two of which must be relevant to the course the candidate wishes to offer. Credit/merit in English Language and Mathematics are additional requirements.

title: GEOGRAPHY/MATHEMATICS
utme_requirements:
A Senior Secondary School Certificate (SSC)/NECO or GCE ‘O’ Level with passes in five (5) subjects including English language and Mathematics in not more than two sittings.  Three of the credits must be in Geography. English and Mathematics.

A Grade II Teacher’s Certificate (TC II) with credit or merit passes in five subjects two of which must be relevant to the course the candidate wishes to offer. Credit/merit in English Language and Mathematics are additional requirements.
subjects: English Language and any other three Arts subjects.

title: HOME ECONOMICS (DOUBLE MAJOR)
utme_requirements:
a)     A minimum of five (5) credits including English and Mathematics and other 3 in any of the related areas like Foods and Nutrition, Home Management, Clothing and Textiles, Chemistry, Physics, Biology, Agriculture, Health Education, Integrated Science and Economics at not more than 2 sittings.

b)     For candidates who have offered courses in Vocational and Technical Education such as NABTEB, RSA or City and Guilds Intermediates Certificate, and Federal Craft Training Certificate, credit/merit in at least five (5) subjects at not more than two sittings with credit in English and Mathematics are acceptable as substitute qualifications.

c)     Associateship Certificate in Education award by an approved institution in Nigeria or abroad, is also acceptable as qualification provided it is assessed by Federal Ministry of Education to meet the same requirement as Nigerian ‘O’ level certificate.
subjects: English Language and three (3) others related subject as listed above

title: IGBO/SOCIAL STUDIES
utme_requirements:
A Senior Secondary School Certificate (SSC) or G.C.E. O’ Level with credit in 5 subjects including English Language and Mathematics in not more than two sittings.

A Grade II Teachers’ Certificate (TC II) with credit or merit in five subjects, two which must be relevant to the course the candidate wishes to offer. Credit/merit in English Language and Mathematics are required.
subjects: English Language and any other three Arts subjects from Government, Economics, Geography, History, Commerce, Literature etc.

title: IGBO/SOCIAL STUDIES
utme_requirements:
A Senior Secondary School Certificate (SSC) or G.C.E. O’ Level with credit in 5 subjects including English Language and Mathematics in not more than two sittings.

title: IGBO/THEATRE ARTS
utme_requirements:
A Senior Secondary School Certificate (SSC) or G. C. E. O’ Level with credits in 5 subjects including Mathematics and English Language at not more than two sittings. A credit in Literature in English is required.

A Grade II Teachers’ Certificate (TC II) with credit or merit in five subjects, one of which must be Literature in English and Mathematics are the requirements.

Associateship Certificate in Education awarded by an approved institution in Nigeria or Abroad is also an acceptable qualification.
subjects: English Language and any other three Arts subjects.

title: IGBO/THEATRE ARTS
utme_requirements:
A Senior Secondary School Certificate (SSC) or G. C. E. O’ Level with credits in 5 subjects including Mathematics and English Language at not more than two sittings. A credit in Literature in English is required.

A Grade II Teachers’ Certificate (TC II) with credit or merit in five subjects, one of which must be Literature in English and Mathematics are the requirements.

Associateship Certificate in Education awarded by an approved institution in Nigeria or Abroad is also an acceptable qualification.
subjects: English Language and any other three Arts subjects.

title: INDUSTRIAL TECHNICAL EDUCATION
utme_requirements:
a)     A Senior Secondary School Certificate SSCE or GCE ‘O’ Level with credit in five (5) subjects including English Language and Mathematics in not more than two sittings.

b)     Candidates with NABTEB- NTC must possess at least five (5) credits which must include Mathematics, English and three other relevant subjects, WAEC Technical Certificate or City and Guilds Intermediate Certificate with credit/merit in at least five (5) subjects three of which must be components of Technical Education are acceptable qualifications.

c)     A Grade II Teacher’s Certificate (TC II) with credit or merit in five subject three of which must be relevant to Technical Education.  Credit/merit in English Language and Mathematics are requirements.
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Physics and any other Technical or Science subjects.

title: INTEGRATED SCIENCE (DOUBLE MAJOR)
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Biology/Chemistry and any other Science subject.
subjects: Any three (3) of Mathematics, Biology, Physics, Chemistry.

title: INTEGRATED SCIENCE/BIOLOGY
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics Biology and any two (2) Science subjects
subjects: Biology and any other two (2) Science subjects.

title: INTEGRATED SCIENCE/CHEMISTRY
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Biology and any other Science subject.
subjects: Any three (3) of Chemistry, Biology, Physics, General Science/Mathematics.

title: INTEGRATED SCIENCE/COMPUTER EDUCATION
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Biology/Agricultural Science and Chemistry.
subjects: Biology/Agricultural Science, Physics and Chemistry.

title: INTEGRATED SCIENCE/COMPUTER SCIENCE EDUCATION
utme_requirements:
a)     Senior Secondary School Certificate of WAEC, NECO, NABTEB or any other equivalent certificate from recognized examination bodies with credit in five (5) subjects including English Languages and Mathematics at not more than two sittings.

b)     A grade II Teacher’s Certificate (TC II) with credit or merit in five (5) subjects including Mathematics and General Science.
subjects: English Language and any three of the following Chemistry, Biology/Agaric science, Mathematics, Physics and any other science related subjects.

title: INTEGRATED SCIENCE/MATHEMATICS
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics and any three (3) of the following

1. Biology/Agricultural Science

2. Chemistry

3. Physics and

4. General Science
subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of: Biology, Physics and Chemistry.

title: INTEGRATED SCIENCE/PHYSICS
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics Physics and any two (2) Science subjects
subjects: Physics and any other two (2) Science subjects.

title: MATHEMATICS/BIOLOGY
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes, in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, and any other two (2) Science subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, Biology and any other Science subject.

title: MATHEMATICS/CHEMISTRY
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry and any other two (2) Science subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, Chemistry and Biology/Physics.

title: MATHEMATICS/COMPUTER SCIENCE EDUCATUION
utme_requirements:
a)     Senior secondary school certificate of WAEC or NECO or any other equivalent certificate from recognized examination bodies with credit in five subjects including English Languages and Mathematics at not more than two sittings. Two of the credits must be in the subjects making up the combinations the candidates wish to offer.

b)     A grade II Teacher’s Certificate (TC II) with credit or merit in five (5) subjects in not more than two sittings Credits/Merits in English language and Mathematics are required for Candidates wishing to study any science programme.

c)     A pass in Pre-NCE Mathematics final examination or a pass in IJMB Mathematics final examination and a pass in JAMB is required for admission.
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, and any two of the following: Physics, Chemistry and Biology

title: MATHEMATICS/ECONOMICS
utme_requirements:
A Senior Secondary School Certificate (SSSC) or O’ Level with credit 5 subjects including English Language, Mathematics and Economics at not more than two sittings.

A grades II Teacher’s Certificate (TC II) with credit or merit in five (5) subjects in not more than two sittings Credits/Merits in English language and Mathematics.
subjects: English Language and any other three Arts subjects

title: MATHEMATICS/GEOGRAPHY
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Geography and any two (2) of Science/Social Sciences.
subjects: Mathematics, Geography and any other Science/Social Science subject.

title: MATHEMATICS/PHYSICS
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics and two (2) other Science subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and any other Science subject.

title: MUSIC/THEATRE ARTS
utme_requirements:
A Senior Secondary School Certificate (SSC) or G. C. E. O’ Level with credits in 5 subjects including Mathematics and English Language at not more than two sittings. A credit in Literature in English is required.

A Grade II Teachers’ Certificate (TC II) with credit or merit in five subjects, one of which must be Literature in English and Mathematics are the requirements.

Associateship Certificate in Education awarded by an approved institution in Nigeria or Abroad is also an acceptable qualification.
subjects: English Language and any other three Arts subjects.

title: MUSIC/THEATRE ARTS
utme_requirements:
A Senior Secondary School Certificate (SSC) or G. C. E. O’ Level with credits in 5 subjects including Mathematics and English Language at not more than two sittings. A credit in Literature in English is required.

A Grade II Teachers’ Certificate (TC II) with credit or merit in five subjects, one of which must be Literature in English and Mathematics are the requirements.

Associateship Certificate in Education awarded by an approved institution in Nigeria or Abroad is also an acceptable qualification.
subjects: English Language and any other three Arts subjects.

title: PHYSICAL & HEALTH EDUCATION (DOUBLE MAJOR)
utme_requirements:
a)   a)     Senior secondary school certificate of WAEC or NECO or any other equivalent Certificate from recognized examination bodies with credit passes in five subjects including English Languages and Mathematics at not more than two sittings.

b)  b)   A grades II Teacher’s Certificate (TC II) with credit or merit in five (5) subjects. Credits/Merits in English language and Mathematics.
subjects: English Language and one science subject and any other two science or social science subject.

title: PHYSICS/COMPUTER SCIENCE EDUCATION
utme_requirements: Senior Secondary School Certificate of WAEC, NECO, NABTEB or any other equivalent certificate from recognized examination bodies with credit in five (5) subjects including English Languages and Mathematics.
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Physics and any other Science subject.

title: PRIMARY EDUCATION STUDIES
utme_requirements:
A Senior Secondary School Certificate (SSC) or G.C.E. O’ Level with credit in 5 subjects (including English Language and Mathematics) at not more than two sittings.

A Grade II Teacher’s Certificate (TC II) with credits or merits passes in 5 subjects including English and Mathematics.
subjects: English Language and Mathematics plus any other two subjects

title: SOCIAL STUDIES/ECONOMICS
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Economics, Government/History and any other Social Science subject.
subjects: Economics, History/Government and any other Social Science subject.

title: SOCIAL STUDIES/GEOGRAPHY
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Geography and two (2) of Government/History, Christian Religious Studies/Christian Religious Studies, Economics.
subjects: Geography and two (2) of Economics, Government/History, Christian Religious Studies/Islamic Studies.

title: SOCIAL STUDIES/IGBO
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Government/History, Igbo, one (1)   Arts/Social Science subject.

utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry/Physics and any other Science subject.

utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Literature in English, Government/History and any one (1)    Arts/Social Science subject.
subjects: Literature in English, Government/History and one (1) Arts/Social Science subject.

title: THEATRE ARTS/IGBO
utme_requirements:
A Senior Secondary School Certificate (SSC) or G. C. E. O’ Level with credits in 5 subjects including Mathematics and English Language at not more than two sittings. A credit in Literature in English is required.

A Grade II Teachers’ Certificate (TC II) with credit or merit in five subjects, one of which must be Literature in English and Mathematics are the requirements.

Associateship Certificate in Education awarded by an approved institution in Nigeria or Abroad is also an acceptable qualification.

Note: Candidates wishing to major in Igbo must have credit in the language at the SSCE/NECO or GCE ‘O’ level.
subjects: English Language and any other three Arts subjects

Associateship Certificate in Education awarded by an approved institution in Nigeria or Abroad is also an acceptable qualification.
subjects: English Language and any other three Arts subjects.
